description.ruby-sapphire:
Rakes the foe with sharp
claws, etc., 2 to 5 times.
description.emerald:
Rakes the foe with sharp
claws, etc., 2 to 5 times.

with sharp claws or
scythes two to five
times.

sharp claws or
scythes for two to
five times in quick
succession.

sharp claws or

succession.

effect.full:
Inflicts regular damage.  Hits 2–5 times in one turn.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.
